title: Short-Term Course for Enhancing Digital-Based Personal Tutor Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with University Educational Environments and Basic Digital Device Skills
context.additional_context: Blended education for understanding the role of personal tutors, acquiring learner support skills, and enhancing interaction methods in digital environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain university personal tutoring policies and procedures with over 90% accuracy.
Learners design and implement at least three scenarios for tutor-student interactions using digital tools.
Learners submit problem-solving projects based on tutoring case studies with over 80% completion.

constraints.accessibility: 화면 읽기 기능 호환, 고대비 디자인 적용

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
